mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updateDate FROM ( select rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from tbl_board where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} order by bno asc ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (bno, title, content, writer) values (seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
